Class TomcatEngine

java.lang.Object
org.jboss.modcluster.container.tomcat.TomcatEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Engine
public class TomcatEngine extends Object implements Engine
Engine implementation that wraps a Context.

Paul Ferraro
